text:
🚰 **Message from the Future**

According to Kyivteploenergo, there will be no water supply starting tomorrow at 9:00 AM.

The estimated time for the return of water supply will be communicated by Kyivteploenergo tomorrow, based on the volume of work.

@kpicampus
rephrased_news: Kyivteploenergo has announced that water supply will be suspended starting tomorrow at 9:00 AM. The estimated time for restoration will be provided tomorrow based on the amount of work required.
title: Water Supply Disruption Tomorrow

text:
UPD: The disconnection of hot water supply has been extended until June 10.

@kpicampus
rephrased_news: The hot water supply disconnection has been extended until June 10.
title: Hot Water Shutdown Extended

text:
🟢 **Administration**

**Settlement**
The settlement algorithm for the summer will be announced tomorrow, based on a similar, [last year's principle](https://t.me/kpicampus/1580).

The number of settlement places for the next academic year is planned to increase by 1,500. Instructions for the settlement itself will be available by July 17.

**Elevators**
Elevators are starting to resume operation, but it is necessary to monitor the disconnection schedules to avoid getting stuck in the elevator in the middle of the night.

**Inventory**
From June 5 to June 7, an inventory commission will check the current state of inventory in the rooms.

@kpicampus
rephrased_news: The summer settlement algorithm will be announced tomorrow, following last year's model. An increase of 1,500 settlement places is planned for the next academic year, with instructions available by July 17. Elevators are resuming operation, but users should check disconnection schedules to avoid getting stuck. An inventory check will take place from June 5 to June 7.
title: Summer Settlement Updates

text:
🟢 **Administration 06.08**

**Settlement**
It will start on August 26, and by the end of the week, there will be lists for settlement from faculties and institutes. A total of about 9,000 students are planned to be brought to mixed learning.

**Masters**
By August 2, they should have written a [request](https://docs.google.com/document/d/13FJxmoUKzXYeRo9T8oGxshdi3MXm1faIDpQwAO6Tk1E/edit?usp=sharing) for a change in payment format and extension of residence in the dormitory until August 31.

If you did not write a request, please contact the manager.

**Hot Water**
In some dormitories, there has been no hot water for 3 months due to major repair work.

**Elevators**
Due to the stabilization of electricity supply, the operation of most elevators will be restored.

@kpicampus
rephrased_news: Settlement will begin on August 26, with lists from faculties and institutes available by the end of the week. Approximately 9,000 students are expected to participate in mixed learning. Master's students must submit a request for a change in payment format and dormitory extension by August 2. Some dormitories have been without hot water for three months due to repairs. Most elevators will resume operation due to stabilized electricity supply.
title: August Settlement Plans Announced

text:
[🎸](https://telegra.ph/file/159f89439938f4ce0f8e8.png) **Guitar Evening**

The heat is gradually subsiding, and the holidays are coming to an end. Spend one of the last summer evenings at the **Guitar Evening** on **August 23 at 18:00**. Visit [KPI Coliseum](https://maps.app.goo.gl/h57HaE7TBMSJS4fXA) in **bright clothing** to enjoy live music in the company of like-minded people.

To enter, you need to fill out the [form](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSdIHYEO4ZuYGDWak_ZhXVk_5cxSXlxm0diaaRgj5zayHonQpQ/viewform?usp=sf_link) by **August 22 at 23:59** and donate **100** **₴** so that we can continue to hold events in free Ukraine. Note that the entrance fee will be **150** **₴**.
rephrased_news: A Guitar Evening is scheduled for August 23 at 18:00 at the KPI Coliseum. Attendees are encouraged to wear bright clothing and enjoy live music. Entry requires filling out a form by August 22 and a donation of 100 UAH, with an entrance fee of 150 UAH.
title: Join the Guitar Evening

text:
🌡 **Disconnection of Hot Water**

**Due to emergency work by Kyivteploenergo, there is no hot water in some dormitories.**

Hot water supply is planned to be restored by the evening of August 29.

@kpicampus
rephrased_news: Some dormitories are currently without hot water due to emergency work by Kyivteploenergo, with restoration planned by the evening of August 29.
title: Hot Water Outage Alert

text:
**Promotion**

**Hot water has been turned off only for dormitory 8. A plumber is conducting repair work, and it should be ready by the evening.**
rephrased_news: Hot water has been turned off only for dormitory 8, where repair work is underway and is expected to be completed by the evening.
title: Dormitory 8 Hot Water Repairs

text:
💧 **Water Disconnection**

**Due to emergency work by Kyivteploenergo, there may be interruptions in water supply in some dormitories.**

Water supply is planned to be restored by 14:00 on September 16.

@kpicampus
rephrased_news: Due to emergency work by Kyivteploenergo, some dormitories may experience interruptions in water supply, with restoration anticipated by 14:00 on September 16.
title: Water Supply Interruptions Expected
